alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 7:33PM CDT until September 24 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Greene County in eastern Arkansas... Western Clay County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 733 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Reyno, or 11 miles west of Corning, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Corning, Lafe, Reyno, Knobel, O`Kean, Success, Peach Orchard, Delaplaine, Datto, Evening Star, Beech Grove, Heelstring, Stonewall, Tipperary, Case, Brookings, Knob, Twin Oaks, Palatka and Faulknerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
